projects.title: Robust SmartStep: Anomaly Filtering for PDR
projects.excerpt: Deep learning-based anomaly filtering for enhanced step detection in Pedestrian Dead Reckoning systems.
projects.description: Novel approach using segment-based autoencoders to distinguish genuine walking signals from anomalies for improved PDR accuracy.
projects.imageCaption: Step detection comparison with and without anomaly filtering

projects.title: RSNA Breast Cancer Detection
projects.excerpt: Deep learning model for breast cancer detection from mammogram images using CNNs.
projects.description: Kaggle competition project exploring state-of-the-art deep learning techniques for accurate breast cancer detection in medical imaging.
projects.imageCaption: CNN architecture for breast cancer detection

projects.title: Contradictory Text Analysis NLP
projects.excerpt: BERT-based text classification for identifying entailment, contradiction, and neutral relationships in sentence pairs.
projects.description: NLP deep learning project using transformers to classify semantic relationships between premise-hypothesis pairs.
projects.imageCaption: BERT model for natural language understanding

projects.title: Pedestrian Dead Reckoning with Deep Learning
projects.excerpt: AI-powered indoor positioning system using smartphone IMU sensors and anomaly detection.
projects.description: Research project implementing deep learning models for accurate pedestrian navigation without GPS.
projects.imageCaption: Neural network architecture for step detection

projects.title: Zephyr RTOS Sensor Hub
projects.excerpt: A multi-sensor data collection platform built on Zephyr RTOS with BLE connectivity and cloud integration.
projects.description: Complete IoT sensor hub featuring temperature, humidity, and motion sensors with real-time data streaming.
projects.imageCaption: Sensor hub running on nRF52840 development kit

projects.title: Muzziball - Smart Interactive Ball
projects.excerpt: Sophisticated embedded system combining hardware and software to create an interactive ball with sensors and actuators.
projects.description: Advanced motion control system with IMU integration, RGB LED matrix, and real-time data transmission capabilities.

projects.title: Wireless Crack Detection System
projects.excerpt: Real-time crack detection system combining Acoustic Emission technology with IoT capabilities for infrastructure monitoring.
projects.description: Master thesis project demonstrating integration of embedded systems with cloud technologies using Raspberry Pi gateway and MQTT protocol.

projects.title: Secure IoT System with AWS Integration
projects.excerpt: Comprehensive IoT security project with ESP32, implementing SSL/TLS encryption and AWS cloud integration.
projects.description: Secure sensor data collection and cloud storage system with X.509 certificates, Lambda functions, and real-time monitoring dashboard.

projects.title: Smart Home IoT System with Android Control
projects.excerpt: Comprehensive smart home automation featuring Android app interface and ESP32 hardware with Firebase integration.
projects.description: Complete home automation solution with secure authentication, automated environmental control, and real-time sensor monitoring.
projects.imageCaption: Smart home system with Android control interface

projects.title: Free Space Optical Communication with AES Encryption
projects.excerpt: Secure free space optical communication system using LASER technology with AES encryption and MATLAB interface.
projects.description: Comprehensive study combining theoretical analysis with practical implementation, supporting audio, video, text, and image transmission.

projects.title: IoT Wireless Crack Detection System
projects.excerpt: Wireless structural health monitoring system using acoustic emission sensors and ESP32.
projects.description: Master's thesis project - Real-time crack detection in heritage buildings using IoT and acoustic emission analysis.
projects.imageCaption: System architecture for wireless crack detection
